SQL.LOAD: SELECT m.oc_message_id, t.oc_template_id, t.template_code, t.description as template_description, m.sender_reason, m.created_by, m.created_date FROM elp_oc_message m inner join elp_oc_template t on m.oc_template_id = t.oc_template_id WHERE m.oc_message_id = :oc_message_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_DEALER_AND_CONDITION: SELECT m.oc_message_id, t.oc_template_id, t.template_code, t.description as template_description, m.sender_reason, ( select listagg(recipient_address,', ') within group (order by created_date) cnt from elp_oc_message_recipient where oc_message_id = m.oc_message_id) as recipient_address, ( select max(ocma.created_date) from elp_oc_message_recipient ocmr left outer join elp_oc_message_attemps ocma on ocmr.oc_message_recipient_id = ocma.oc_message_recipient_id where oc_message_id = m.oc_message_id) as last_attempted_on, ( select elp_utl_lov.description(process_status_xcd, :language_id) from (select ocma.process_status_xcd, ocmr.oc_message_id, ocma.created_date as date1, max(ocma.created_date) over (partition by ocma.oc_message_recipient_id) as max_date from elp_oc_message_recipient ocmr left outer join elp_oc_message_attemps ocma on ocmr.oc_message_recipient_id = ocma.oc_message_recipient_id) dt where dt.date1 = dt.max_date and dt.oc_message_id = m.oc_message_id and rownum = 1) as last_attempted_status, ce.cert_number as certificate_number, ce.cert_id, cl.claim_number, cl.claim_id, cs.case_number, cs.case_id, m.created_by, m.created_date FROM elp_oc_message m inner join elp_oc_template t on m.oc_template_id = t.oc_template_id inner join elp_oc_template_group tg on t.oc_template_group_id = tg.oc_template_group_id inner join elp_oc_template_group_dealer tgd on tg.oc_template_group_id = tgd.oc_template_group_id inner join elp_dealer d on tgd.dealer_id = d.dealer_id left outer join elp_cert ce on ce.cert_id = m.cert_id left outer join elp_claim cl on cl.claim_id = m.claim_id left outer join elp_case cs on cs.case_id = m.case_id WHERE 1 = 1 --dynamic_where_clause_dealer --dynamic_where_clause ORDER BY m.created_date
